law.history: Repealed 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 487, sec. 27, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 334, effective January 2, 1978. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2034, 2039.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Limitation of disbursements for care of minor -- Court order to use principal of personalty.
